content: दूषित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दुष्-णिच्-क्त] {@--1@} Corrupted, defiled, spoiled. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Hurt, injured. ({%b%}) Marred, spoiled, frustrated; <ls>Ś. 5. 9.</ls> ({%c%}) Blinded, obscured, injured; <ls>Ku. 4. 8.</ls> {@--3@} Damaged, demoralized. {@--4@} Blamed, censured. {@--5@} Falsely accused, traduced, vilified. --ता A girl who has been violated. --तं A fault, offence; <ls>U. 4. 14.</ls>
